This is the first Guinea Pig film from Japan and this is the sickest, in my opinion. A bunch of guys torture a girl for several days before eventually stabbing her in the gut when she lashes out, but they bury her this time, unlike the others who have been burnt and placed in vials and seen cleaning the place.
